name: Smokeping
short_description: Latency and packet loss monitoring tool with graphing capabilities.
description: Latency and packet loss monitoring tool with graphing capabilities. Smokeping is a self-hosted application focused on network, monitoring, dashboard, utility. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Smokeping on your home server to latency and packet loss monitoring tool with graphing capabilities without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Smokeping to manage your network workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
